Window

Class SettingsPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TView
      • Support.navigator.TPage
        • Window.JFXPage
          • Window.SettingsPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView, IPage, ISettingsPage

    public class SettingsPage
extends JFXPage
implements ISettingsPage
    Object instance of this class is responsible for the initialisation and draw of graphical component displayed on settings page. Contains the implementation of application page/view component specified by ISettingsPage interface. The class extends the JFXPage javaFX specific abstract page class.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey
